actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the making of clad strip from which slugs can be cut for use in coin operated machines and to prohibit misrepresentation as to proof and uncirculated coins.

summary.text: Imposes criminal sanctions on anyone who imports, makes, possesses, sells or uses clad strips from which slugs can be cut for use in coin-operated machines. (Adds 18 U.S.C. 510, 715)

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the making of clad strip from which slugs can be cut for use in coin operated machines and to prohibit misrepresentation as to proof and uncirculated coins.
